A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great movie if you have Alzheimers and like flashy lights. Seriously the worst Star Wars movie ever. I would pay a lot of money to have my memory wiped of this bantha fodder. I really enjoyed the force awakens but this just ruined it for me. What happen to the plot? Feels like they made the choices they did for the sake of doing the unexpected.  I have no desire to see episode 9. Star Wars is dead and you can thank Disney.
